title: Imperial Pursuit
description: Imperial forces are closing in. Can you escape in time?

title: The Sisterhood
description: The Sisterhood's plans encompass millennia.

title: Bug Hunt
description: "Is this going to be a standup fight sir, or just another bug hunt?" -Lt. Gorman

title: Stagecoach Heist
description: A thrilling ride through a beautiful landscape. With guns.

title: The Stranger
description: Mysterious drifter, menacing outsider, or loner hero. You Choose.

title: Frontier Town
description: Life in a Western Town.

title: Magical Flora
description: A biome bursting with beautiful and mysterious plant life.

title: Ghost Ship
description: Adrift on the seas, what has become of its crew?

title: The Madding Crowd
description: Crowded cities can often be comforting.

title: Counting House
description: A sturdy, and gleaming center of commerce in the middle of the city.

title: Hidden Passage
description: A long rumored path has been found. But, is it safe?

title: Pagan Woods
description: Spirits exist in the trees, the rocks, and the loam.

title: Mainframe
description: The digital plane contains echoes of humanity.

title: Rebuilding
description: A destroyed village is rebuilt by the townsfolk.

title: Jungle Bunker
description: "There's only a few guards, this shouldn't be too much trouble" - H. Solo

title: Stakeout
description: Who watches the watchmen?

title: Collegium Magica
description: Shelves brim with books and scrolls of ancient knowledge.

title: Tomb Guardians
description: Two giant statues guard the secrets of the vault.

title: Ship of the Line
description: The fastest ship in the fleet, and the best appointed.

title: Forgotten Forest
description: A nexus between realms, these woods are brimming with magical energy.

title: Docking Procedure
description: A veteran freighter captain coerces her ancient ship into port.

title: Nautiloid Escape
description: An illithid ship is tearing itself apart as you and your party race to escape.

title: Viking Tavern
description: What's better than an ale, and a warm fire after a day of pillaging?

title: Treacherous Path
description: "I know a shortcut!" - The bard, probably

title: Brood Mother
description: Ten thousand hatchlings swarm around the matriarch. The door closes behind you.

title: Vampyr
description: "I want you to believe...to believe in things that you cannot" - Bram Stoker

title: Steel Foundry
description: Shadows dance on soot-blackened walls. Molten metal writhes like a captive star.

title: The Drowned Tower
description: An ancient tower lies forgotten in the depths, guarded by leviathans.

title: Feast of Crispian
description: Soldiers gather in the great hall for a feast before battle.

title: Whispering Caverns
description: An underground prison for tortured souls. What secrets will they whisper?

title: Whiteout
description: Up is down, down is up, and you're freezing.

title: The Misty Marsh
description: A crepuscular paddle among the rushes and reeds.

title: Homecoming
description: A city welcomes its heroes upon their return.

title: The Ansible
description: An ancient device for instant communication over unimaginable distances

title: Launch Day
description: A community gathers to watch a historic launch.

title: Demon Army
description: Beyond the gates of hell, the horde prepares for battle.

title: Hellhound Alley
description: Yond hounds have a lean and hungry look. Such dogs are dangerous.

title: Trireme
description: It's a beautiful day for a boat ride around the Greek Islands.

title: Train Job
description: A 1960s-era heist film, starring you and your dashing friends.[4 Alternate versions available for Patreon Patrons]

title: Desert Devotional
description: This ancient ritual often goes on for weeks.

title: Medieval Market
description: A picture-perfect town on a beautiful spring day.

title: Lord of Bones
description: Don't call him Mr. Bones, or Boney, or Boney McBoneFace.

title: Docking Bay
description: War is coming. Mechs and droids load supplies onto massive ships.

title: The Attic
description: An old house has many secrets. Halloween 2023.

title: Infiltration
description: Stay quiet, stay low, stay alive.

title: Western Watchtower
description: A once mighty bulwark lies fallow in a time of peace.

title: Banshee's Lair
description: A strange old crone lives alone in the forest - waiting.

title: Long Rest
description: It's been a day.

title: Halfling Sneak
description: You couldn't resist that shiny orb, could you?

title: The Great Lift
description: There's only one way up - or down.

title: Terraforming
description: It takes decades to create an atmosphere on a lifeless planet.

title: Descent
description: Grab that 50 feet of rope. You're going down.

title: Through the Woods
description: A horse-drawn carriage hurtles down a dark wooded lane.

title: Voyage Begins
description: Dock workers and sailors prepare a ship for departure.

title: Rise of the Golem
description: I have a giant golem, I made it out of clay.

title: Hall of Angels
description: Angelic statues turn to observe - but only when you're not looking.

title: Infernal Machine
description: A massive, noisy, beast of a thing.

title: Den of Iniquity
description: A seedier tavern on the other side of town.

title: Whirlpool
description: A deadly ocean vortex threatens to devour your ship and crew.

title: Awakenings
description: **Boot sequence..initialized** Neural network: online** Primary init..successful.

title: Troll Grotto
description: Mog is an ornery troll who prefers the quiet life above the Arctic Circle.

title: Ghosts of Appalachia
description: A derelict shack in the woods may have a past of its own.

title: Rope Bridge
description: This bridge doesn't look safe.

title: Roc's Nest
description: A massive mythical bird protecting her clutch.

title: Trail of Ashes
description: From battle to battle, war marches on.

title: River of Blood
description: This great red river runs through the fractured lands.

title: Starship Adrift
description: Set engines to low, hide in a nearby nebula

title: Rolling Emporium
description: Pulled by a massive aurochs, this wheeled market never slows, and never stops.

title: Ancient Beacon
description: Ten thousand years have gone by without a response.

title: Pit Fighter
description: Welcome to Thunderdome.

title: Skull Island
description: As your ship approaches, you feel like you're being watched.

title: Egg Chamber
description: A few of these translucent pods are starting to quiver...

title: Promontory
description: Nighttime on a rocky clifftop is a great place to reminisce.

title: Adventure Begins
description: Every story has a beginning.

title: Hydroponics Bay
description: A place to grow food and cultivate alien botany aboard a starship.

title: Warlock's Whisper
description: Dark magic. Darker soul.

title: Spirit of the Plains
description: The great stag of the plains is seldom seen, and speaks to few mortals.

title: Black Rider
description: Roaming the world on horseback, in search of the darkest powers.

title: Halfling Lodge
description: A cozy fire, a mug of ale, and a long pipe. Halfling hospitality at its finest.

title: Covert Ops
description: A dark and gritty world of espionage. Not a martini in sight.

title: Puzzle Dungeon
description: A vast, mechanical, moving labyrinth. Step lightly.

title: Viking Village
description: Life in a northern town.

title: Elven Procession
description: A secret elf ritual that few mortals have ever witnessed.

title: Tinkertown
description: Machines fixing machines, fixing machines.

title: High Seas Pursuit
description: The rigging groans under a full press of sail. Speed is of the essence.

title: Y≈çkai Forest
description: The veil between our world, and the spirit world, is especially thin here.

title: Dungeon Collapse
description: You probably shouldn't have picked up that ancient idol.

title: Tavern Celebration
description: The mead must flow.

title: Beggar's Rest
description: All great cities have a seedy side.

title: Starbase Omega
description: The promenade of this massive orbital station hums with activity.

title: Red Planet
description: A small group of intrepid humans establishes the first Martian colony.

title: Adventure Supply
description: Everything you need for your next adventure is sold here.

title: Village of the Damned
description: Something is terribly, terribly wrong here. Halloween 2022.

title: Medieval Banquet
description: A grand feast in the great hall. Eat, drink, and be merry.

title: Abandoned Chapel
description: Nature has burst through the walls. A moody gothic reverie.

title: Harpies' Nest
description: A clutch of eggs in a cliffside nest, jealously guarded by fearsome winged creatures.

title: Arcane Athenaeum
description: A mystical library in which everything is in motion.

title: Myconid Colony
description: In a warm corner of the Underdark, the fungus folk dwell.

description: What unnatural forces have imbued these sailors with a foul mimicry of life?

title: Mega City Slums
description: When cities are the size of continents, not everyone lives the good life.

title: Desert Temple
description: As much a fortress as it is a place of devotion.

title: Battle Requiem
description: "War does not determine who is right - only who is left." - Bertrand Russell

title: Invisible Mountain

description: A Faceless organization gathers to orchestrate events, and re-shape the world.

title: Shaman's Hollow
description: A secluded spot in the forest where the magic is concentrated

description: Looming before you is a massive black gate, carved into the side of a mountain.

title: Robot Scrapyard
description: Repair, recycle, rebuild, repeat.

title: Goblin Ambush
description: Goblins are always trying to take stuff without paying.

title: Dragon Rider
description: Astride a dragon, the wind and the skies beckon.

description: Surviving was the easy part. Now the real work begins.

title: Dusk of the Dryad
description: Walk the forest gently, lest you upset the dryad.

title: Generation Ship
description: The last survivors of a dying world continue their 500-year journey to a new home.

title: Swamp Thing
description: Deep within a fetid swamp, an ancient creature lurks.

title: Moisture Farm
description: On a desolate planet, massive machines extract water from the air.

title: Bloodgate
description: A dimensional portal tended to by dark wizards.

title: Skullwharf
description: A dangerous, underground port accessible only by sea caves and secret passages.

title: Sand Raiders
description: On a desert planet, far far away. A nomadic tribe struggles for survival.

title: Aftermath
description: Humanity always finds a way.

title: Hidden Valley
description: After an arduous journey, the vista before you is a welcome sight.

title: Fog of War
description: A small band of warriors prepares for battle.

title: Summoning
description: A coven prepares to summon an ancient spirit.

description: A misty morning on the canals. Vendors and buyers go about their routines.

description: Iridescent liquid swirls in its depths. A potent source of arcane energy.

description: An interstellar vessel prepares for braking. Buckle in.

description: A massive, spirit-filled city of the dead. Don't kick the skulls.

description: A foul, smoldering pit, reeking of brimstone and disappointment.

description: A rag tag group stops to make camp, and reflect on what went wrong.

title: The Frozen Trail
description: A serene and snowy backdrop, against which anything can happen.

description: Last call, before you make the winding walk home in Dark City.

description: A sharp-eyed scamp wanders a medieval city's back alleys.

title: Sanitarium
description: A private facility on a windy bluff. Most patients never leave.

title: Bleakwater Docks
description: This turn-of-the-century, New England fishing village has a dark secret.

title: Investigator's Office
description: Boston, 1919. Strange things are afoot. You've been hired to look into them.

title: Wagon Ride
description: A solemn ride to an uncertain destination. How did you get here? What have you done?

title: Ancient Artifact
description: A mysterious object, dormant for centuries, begins to thrum with energy.

title: Everdeep
description: A vast underwater city, hidden for millennia.

title: Blastfire Bog
description: Alternate versions available for Patreon Patrons

title: High Rannoc Village
description: Alternate versions available for Patreon Patrons

title: Oasis City
description: A glimmering desert city, built on the most precious commodity of all. Water.

title: Pattern Recognition
description: Hack the system, stay in the shadows.

title: The Wild Hunt
description: Charging through the forest on horseback. Woe be your prey.

title: Escape from Shadow
description: The road is long, and frought with peril. May the light guide you.

title: The City Above
description: High above the city, there is peace, and possibility.

title: Blighted Farm
description: Something has befouled your once productive farm.

title: Farmyard
description: A small plot of land, well tended.

title: A New Beginning
description: A new dawn breaks, and new adventures begin.

title: Forge of Fury
description: Dwarven metalwork takes focus, and dedication.

title: Lorekeeper Grove
description: Nature must be protected.

title: Jungle Shaman
description: Between dense jungle, and the ocean, a Shaman calls forth ancestral spirits.

description: A beautifully chaotic, and frenzied environment for work, or play.

title: Court of the Count
description: Your strangely alluring host beckons you to join him in his private study.

title: Orbital Prison Break
description: The galaxy's worst are on the loose.

title: Shrine of Talos
description: God of storms. God of destruction. Have a good reason for being here.

title: Base Assault
description: A ground assault on a heavily fortified position.

title: Mysterious Grotto
description: A dark wind courses through this massive, natural cavern.

title: Victorian Slums
description: Overcrowded, disease-ridden and poxy. There was nothing charming about it.

title: Unto the Breach
description: "When the blast of war blows in our ears, Then imitate the action of the tiger" - W. Shakespeare

title: Skyship
description: These magestic, flying vessels require powerful magic to create and operate.

title: Grand Theater
description: "The play's the thing..."

title: Blighted Forest
description: An unnatural rot is spreading through the trees.

title: Country Workshop
description: A place to potter about, fixing things that want fixing.

title: Ice Dragon
description: Ice dragons are hard to spot in winter, so it's a good thing they like to announce their arrival.

title: The Hearth Inn
description: A bookish sort of place. Cozy, and bigger on the inside.

title: Desert Planet Souk
description: A sprawling, sand-swept bazaar of junk, droids, and everything between.

title: Submerged
description: Floating beneath the surface, one world disappears, another awakens.

description: A collaboration with world-class adventure designer DMDave! [Alternate versions, plus adventure PDF available for Patreon Patrons]

title: Candledeep
description: A massive library inside a fortress. Is the knowledge worth the price of admission?

title: Wolf Pens
description: Deep underground, 3 massive, chained wolves are kept hungry. But for what?

title: Steampunk Station
description: A huge central clock, and all manner of contraptions, keep the trains running on time.

title: Alien Reactor
description: This throbbing mass of bio-electrical energy powers everything.

title: Oregon Trail
description: Strength in numbers, wagon trains headed west for opportunity.

title: Magic Shoppe
description: A small shop, at the end of a quiet, cobblestone street.

title: Secret Facility
description: You're awake, but remember nothing. Now it's time to escape.

title: Vikings
description: "Valhalla, I am coming." - Led Zeppelin

title: Jungle Ruins
description: Deep in the jungle, a hidden city, buried for centuries, is revealed.

title: Spider's Den
description: A massive arachnid lurks amongst the bones of its victims.

title: Pirates!
description: Romantic adventurers, or brigands of the sea. Salty, rum-sodden and irresistable.

title: Throne Room
description: A grand chamber where a monarch granted audience, held council and received homage.

title: Nordic Noir
description: Bleak landscapes, dark themes and powerful stories. A Scandinavian procedural.

title: Mind Flayer Chamber
description: Deep in the twisting maze of passages lies the elder brain, waiting, throbbing.

title: Training Grounds
description: The bustling courtyard of a castle often included soldiers drilling and sparring.

title: Defiled Temple
description: Remnants of a secret religious sect lie in ruin. Horrid creatures lurk in the shadows.

title: Rainy Village
description: The constant rain makes the townfolk welcoming, and the inn cozier.

title: Lush World
description: Verdant, colorific, surreal. A world where life begets beauty.

title: The Orrery
description: A massive mechanical solar system rotates above the monks. Is it science, or devotion?

title: Mech War
description: Large mechanized armies trying to pulverize each other into scrap.

title: Icebound Town
description: One of a series of brutally cold northern towns. Not always friendly.

title: All Hallows' Eve
description: "When the sun sets, who doth not look for night?" Halloween 2020

title: Interrogation Room
description: Whether you're police or suspect, this room is tense.

title: Mushroom Forest
description: As you step into the forest, a warm euphoric glow washes over you.

title: Terror in the Woods
description: It's dark, you can hear them closing in. It's time to move.

title: 60s Computer Lab
description: Whirring machines in underground bunkers. The place where disaster is ultimately avoided.

title: New Orleans Noir
description: Crescent City, 1920s. Something unnatural pervades the usually festive bustle.

title: Mansion: Night
description: Secrets are hidden in the great old house. Wait until dark, tread quietly.

title: Salt Marsh
description: Between ocean and grasslands, lies this ambiguous, liminal space.

description: A peaceful sanctuary to contemplate the essence of the sword.

title: Sunken Treasure
description: In the depths, lie the bounty.

title: Tinkerer's Workshop
description: This gnomish proprieter is a wizard with metal.

description: The way is clear, there's just one not-so-small problem.

title: Storm at Sea
description: A terrifying squall from the east. The crew must work together to save the ship.

title: Waterkeep: Night
description: Nighttime in the jewel of the north.

title: Space Battle
description: Epic finale to a galactic conflict.

title: Castle Kitchen
description: A massive, bustling kitchen was often the center of activity in a medieval castle.

title: Burning Village
description: "It was like this when we got here, honest!"

title: Witch Mountain
description: A lively and chaotic night of magic and danger. [Alternate version available for Patreon Patrons]

title: Thieves' Guild
description: Live in shadow. Live for the perfect crime. This is everything. [Alternate version available for Patreon Patrons]

title: Temple Garden
description: Order and beauty exist in perfect balance here. [Alternate version available for Patreon Patrons]

title: Rat Battle
description: Not every sword is magical. Not every fight is epic.  [Alternate version available for Patreon Patrons]

title: Ghost Town
description: The last time you visited, it was full of people. Where is everyone? [2 alternate versions available for Patreon Patrons]

title: Biodome
description: A controlled, self-sufficient eco-system. It's not outisde, but it feels like it. [Alternate version available for Patreon Patrons]

description: High on a hill, amidst a circle of ancient stones, hooded druids peform a dark ritual. [2 Alternate versions for Patreon Patrons]

title: Sun Dappled Trail
description: You and your party on horseback, travelling through a beautiful forest. [2 Alternate versions for Patreon Patrons]

title: Shadowfell
description: An unpredictable realm of depression, stasis and despair. [Alternate versions for Patreon Patrons]

title: Battle of the Amazons
description: A fierce tribe of warrior women feared for their prowess in battle. [3 Alternate versions for Patreon Patrons]

title: Crossing the Styx
description: The fee for ferrying the dead is a single coin, placed in the mouth. [3 Alternate versions for Patreon Patrons]

title: Shopping Mall
description: A temple to the gods of modern consumerism. A Happy place. [Alternate version for Patreon Patrons]

title: Tarrasque Interior
description: A special holiday free gift! Part of a huge collaboration project. Download the complete adventure, minis, maps and more  Here

title: The Steppes
description: A Mongolian flavored battle track. Mostly Drums. [Alternate version for Patreon Patrons]

title: Swamp Planet
description: An entire planet, shrouded in dense mist, and teeming with life. [2 Alternate versions for Patreon Patrons]

title: Dying World
description: The final days of a once vibrant planet. A return to entropy. [Alternate version for Patreon Patrons]

title: 1940s Boardwalk
description: Take a stroll through the colorful world of 1940s seaside Americana. [Alternate version for Patreon Patrons]

title: Yuletide
description: A cozy fireside gathering of family and friends for the holidays. [2 Alternate versions for Patreon Patrons]

title: Barovian Village
description: Midnight. A small, quiet, mountain village in darkest Barovia. [Alternate version for Patreon Patrons]

title: Endgame
description: Big, brash, pulpy. Save this for the fights you might lose. [Alternate version for Patreon Patrons]

title: Haunted
description: The soundtrack to a place you really shouldn't be. Halloween 2019. [Alternate version for Patreon Patrons]

title: Gravity
description: In space, things can go wrong very quickly. [Alternate version for Patreon Patrons]

title: Underground Lake
description: Deep beneath the mountain, a massive lake shimmers before you. [2 Alternate versions for Patreon Patrons]

title: Sea of Moving Ice
description: These northern waters are treacherous and cold. [2 Alternate versions for Patreon Patrons]

title: Country Village
description: A charming, quiet little village that welcomes you no matter what. [2 Alternate versions for Patreon Patrons]

title: Cyberpunk Bar
description: A seedy place on the outskirts of the city. It's not pretty, but they probably have what you need. [2 Alternate versions for Patreon Patrons]

title: Abandoned Windmill
description: Lying fallow for years on a blustery hilltop, the sails still spin as a weary reminder. But of what? [2 Alternate versions for Patreon Patrons]

title: Cyberpunk City
description: The true melting pot. Language, culture and technology have merged into a single multi-faceted existence.[Alternate version for Patreon Patrons]

title: Ice Throne
description: A frozen chamber from which to rule with an icy heart.  [Alternate version for Patreon Patrons]

description: It's midsummer night down at the "Adventurer's Arms" and the bards are all here. [Alternate version for Patreon Patrons]

description: Desolate, dessicated and dire. What used to be lush, isn't anymore. [2 Alternate versions for Patreon Patrons]

description: In this highly structured setting, those who attend the monarch gather to plot and collude. [2 Alternate versions for Patreon Patrons]

title: Wizard's Tower
description: Amidst bottles and books and beasts in their cage, toils a mighty magician, a wizard most sage. [Alternate version for Patreon Patrons]

title: Robotics Lab
description: A high tech facility for cutting edge research. [Alternate version for Patreon Patrons]

title: Castle Jail
description: A dank, horrible cell in which to ponder your life's choices. [Alternate version for Patreon Patrons]

title: Cry Havoc
description: "Cry Havoc and let slip the dogs of war" - W. Shakespeare [Alternate version for Patreon Patrons]

title: The Underdark
description: A vast subeterranean network of interconnected caverns.  [2 Alternate versions for Patreon Patrons]

description: Hi intensity cyberpunk action for highly modified people and cars. [Alternate version for Patreon Patrons]

title: Fishing Village

title: Quiet Cove
description: A calm tropical inlet for ships to lay at anchor. [2 Alternate versions for Patreon Patrons]

title: RMS Titanic
description: A postprandial stroll along the deck of the world's most luxurious ocean liner. [Alternate version for Patreon Patrons]

title: Cistern
description: A Castle's cistern was a functional necessity, but it could also be beautiful and mysterious.  [2 Alternate versions for Patreon Patrons]

title: Medieval Fair
description: An important economic event in medieval towns. Merchants and entertainers gathered from afar. [Alternate version for Patreon Patrons]

title: Dark Angel
description: A dark homage to the 90s. A great backdrop to brooding drama or full bore action.

title: Forest: Day
description: A breezy, dense, daytime forest setting for adventure or relaxation. You choose. [Alternate version for Patreon Patrons]

title: Shanghai 1930s
description: Known as 'The Paris of the East, the New York of the West'.Anything was possible. [Alternate version for Patreon Patrons]

title: Stables
description: In medieval times, horses were vital for trade, travel, and war. A well run stable was essential. [Alternate version for Patreon Patrons]

title: Waterkeep
description: The fabled jeweled city of the north, a hub for trade, commerce and culture. [2 Alternate versions for Patreon Patrons]

title: Field of Heroes
description: On the field of battle, heroes are born.

title: Star Freighter
description: A massive interstellar vessel used for long haul cargo runs. [Alternate version for Patreon Patrons]

title: Outpost 31
description: Antarctica, 1982. An homage to the wonderful Carpenter/Morricone Score.

title: Artist's Garret
description: In a tiny attic room, rain pattering against the window, fire in the grate, pen in hand.  [Alternate version for Patreon Patrons]

title: Secret Garden
description: A quiet, magical clearing in the forest. All gentle creatures welcome. [Alternate version for Patreon Patrons]

title: Nostromo
description: While the crew prepares to emerge from hypersleep, the ship slowly awakens. Halloween 2018 [Alternate version for Patreon Patrons]

title: Metropolis Fanfare
description: A Heroic introduction to the city of tomorrow.

title: Loop Tales
description: The sounds of Scandinavian, suburban futurism. [Alternate version for Patreon Patrons]

title: Lakeside Camp
description: A quiet spot, off the beaten track. [Alternate version for Patreon Patrons]

title: Barovian Castle
description: For a thousand years the castle has towered over the surrounding villages. People speak of it in hushed tones. [Alternate version for Patreon Patrons]

title: Graveyard
description: The crooked headstones have been overgrown with vines and all manner of creatures commune in the darkness.

title: Floating Ice Castle
description: Kept aloft by an ancient spell, this gleaming fortress served as protection against an enemy no one remembers.

title: Cotton Club
description: Harlem, 1920s. The Cotton Club was the epicenter of the African American social and artistic renaissance (contains Public Domain/1926 recordings).

title: War Zone
description: Incessant shelling of the city below as attack helicopters drone above.  [Alt. version for Patreon Patrons]

title: Elegant Dinner Party
description: The clothing and decorum of these elite gatherings often mask the undertones of intrigue and distrust. [Alternate version for Patreon Patrons]

title: Mummy's Tomb
description: An ancient burial chamber is uncovered after a millenium. What treasures are held within? What terrors?

title: Hermit Hut
description: An old hermit lives a quiet life of routine, alone in an isolated stone hut. But is there something more? [Alternate version for Patreon Patrons]

title: Dark Future
description: In a not too distant future, dense enclaves of humans eke out a living amid towers of twisting metal, glass and neon.

title: Sunken Temple
description: Lost for millenia beneath the waves, an ancient edifice holds countless mysteries. [Alternate version for Patreon Patrons]

title: Desert Winds
description: With little warning, the serenity of the desert is transformed into a maelstrom of biting sand and vicious wind. [Alternate version for Patreon Patrons]

title: Mill Town
description: A busy little mill town on the banks of a river. [Alternate version for Patreon Patrons]

title: Temple of Helm
description: May Helm protect you and absolve you of your curses and afflictions.

title: Dark Matter
description: The sound of the cosmos, or an alternate dimension. Infinite and majestic.

title: Carriage Journey
description: A long, rainy journey in a horse drawn carriage. Plenty of time to look out the window and watch the world go by.  [Alt. version for Patreon Patrons]

title: Halfling Festival
description: Nobody parties like halflings. Nobody.

title: Open Ocean
description: Adrift on the waves. No land in sight, just the way you want it. Tranquility abounds.

title: The Bog Standard
description: A run-of-the-mill medieval tavern. No music, just ambience. Think of it as open-mic night for your Bard.

title: Russian Winter
description: "People don't notice whether it's winter or summer when they're happy" - Anton Chekhov

title: Weirder Things: 2
description: The sequel, to the homage that was the first Weirder Things track. This time, with more 80s.

title: Waiting Time
description: Tick Tock, sometimes adventures need a little downtime music. Lighthearted or slightly sinister, it's up to you to decide.

title: Car Chase!
description: Big engines, big funk, big hair. Put on your shades and strap in for the ride! [2 Alternate versions for Patreon Patrons]

title: Endless Voyage
description: Voyager is the first human-made object to enter interstellar space, traveling "further than anyone, or anything in history."

title: Existential Dread
description: It starts as a tickle at the base of the ganglia, and spreads, slowly, into your consciousness. Happy Halloween 2017!

title: Spire: The Vermissian
description: A massive train network where trains have never really run. Decay and unreality pervade.

title: Spire: The Hatchery
description: Arachnid midwives tend to clutches of unborn with ministrations of blood. And yet, it is a safe, nurturing place.

title: Spire: The Ministry
description: A secret, shadowy society devoted to the forbidden worship of a goddess. Piety, devotion and ritual.

title: Spire: Derelictus
description: Destitute. A run-down sump of a place, riddled with poverty and black magic. Undercity home to the downtrodden Dark Elves.

title: Spire: New Heaven
description: Impossibly high burial grounds where hyenas prowl the streets, and preachers and zealots singing the praises of their gods.

title: Spire: Amaranth
description: The crystalline, frozen home of the haughty, masked, high elves that rule Spire. Lit by stolen northern lights and chilled with imported ice.

title: Spire: The Heart
description: A rotting hole in reality buried at the centre of the mile-high, ancient building that is Spire.

title: Crossroads
description: A dust filled, diesel tinged intersection of modernity and the past. Sit awhile.

title: RavenPuff Common
description: If you've ever been to a school for witchcraft and wizardry, you spent some time in one of these.

title: Antiquarian Study
description: A cluttered, book-filled office in a creaky old house. Rain pattering at the window, and.. someone upstairs?

title: Dwarven City
description: A towering, immense city, hewn from solid rock, where dwarves shape stone and iron into soaring monuments, and mighty weapons.

title: Astral Plane
description: The realm of thought, memory and psychic energy. Where the silver cords of travelers drift on waves of pure magic.

title: Ethereal Plane
description: A radiant ocean spreads itself before you as winds of color and light whirl above.

title: Orbital Promenade
description: A galactic crossroads of commerce and society. The largest and most central ring of the habitat section.

title: Wild West Saloon
description: The rootenest, tootenest, honky tonk this side of Deadwood.

title: 747 Interior
description: The timeless sound of a 747 cabin in flight.

title: Carnival
description: It's the summer of an indiscriminate year. The carnival has come to town. Rides, cotton candy and food on sticks.

title: Lonesome West
description: Brooding skies, ominous horizons. An ode to dark westerns. [Alternate version for Patreon Patrons]

title: Lunar Outpost
description: There has been no contact with the team at Outpost 1138 for weeks. We have dispatched a recon unit to investigate.

title: Weirder Things
description: An homage to an era, and a show. With love.

title: River Town
description: Your journey takes you to a small, tidy village on the bank of a river. The people are kind and the tavern is warm.

title: Testing Chamber
description: An empty factory floor, towering spires of self-activated machines. One way out. Yes..this is what you think it is.

title: Vampire's Castle
description: A sprawling gothic mansion at midnight. Centuries of art and artifacts line these halls, but beware! The Master is about. Halloween 2016

title: Highway
description: It's nighttime, you're walking on the side of a highway and you feel like you're in a David Lynch film. What could go wrong?

title: Volcano
description: The mouth of hell itself, a smoldering vista of rock and lava. Great tongues of fire and sulphur lick a darkening sky.

title: Cavern of Lost Souls
description: A yawning, supulchral chamber filled with the departed spirits of fallen warriors.

title: Lost Mine
description: Hidden for years and only recently discovered, your party must go on a search...for the last party.

title: City Under Siege
description: Pinned down. Safe for now but chaos surrounds you. Move quickly, quietly, and with purpose.

title: Windswept Plains
description: A small band of horsemen bivouac under a never ending sky.

title: Arabesque
description: Adrift on the sands of time, nomadic warriors celebrate a life of conquest and honor.

title: Noir Procedural
description: A TV inspired, urban noir backdrop for intrigue and investigation.

title: Starship Medical
description: The combined anatomical knowledge of the known galaxy. The best medical care in the fleet.

title: Skirmish
description: Oh, it's on. Roll for initiative...

title: Elven Glade
description: Shrouded from human sight, elves of the forest have congregated here for centuries.

title: Dungeon II: Mechanical
description: Deep in the heart of the mountain, ancient machines groan and clank with deadly precision.

title: Winter Woods
description: Cold wind, dry branches, hardy birds. A quiet meditation on winter's tranquility, or a stark backdrop to adventure.

title: Lively Cafe
description: A cornerstone of 21st century culture, the humble coffee shop. A place to relax, read, caffinate. Come for the free wi-fi, stay for the lattes.

title: Winter Festival
description: Holiday celebrations in a small snowy town.

title: Dark City
description: A slow burn action / suspense soundtrack for dark modern settings

title: Sewers
description: Dank and teeming with the foul and pestilent denizens of darkness. Bring extra torches.

title: Lucha Libre!
description: Lucha Libre, the masked, high flying spectacle, is embedded deep in the very soul of Mexican culture.

title: Haunted Ramparts
description: "I am thy father's spirit, Doom'd for a certain term to walk the night, And for the day confined to fast in fires" - W.Shakespeare

title: Nightmare
description: The darkness seethes and writhes about you as you gasp for air. Waking up is a matter of finding the right door. Halloween 2015.

title: 1920s Speakeasy
description: The joint is jumping and the gin is flowing so gussy yourself up and give the heavy at the door your password.

title: Blacksmith Shoppe
description: A blacksmith's shoppe was crucial to the life of a village. From shoeing horses to making armor and weapons. Some even yanked the odd tooth

title: Medieval Battle
description: Two armies meet on the battlefield. Standards wave, drums pound. Steel, horses and bones clash in the fight for supremacy.

title: Steampunk Airship
description: Designed by the greatest watchmaker in Olde-Town, the airship "Gulliver" will ferry you above the fray in style!

title: Abandoned Fair
description: Twisting arcs of rusted steel rise, wavelike, over a ruined landscape. A windblown monument to happier times.

title: Alchemist's Lab
description: Through the haze of bubbling flasks, cages of animals and reams of parchment, a hooded figure bends low over a table muttering strange words.

title: Docks District
description: The person you're supposed to meet is always somewhere in the docks district. Gather your party and venture forth!

title: Zombies!
description: A shambling mass of former humans lurches through the snow, drawn to the scent of your flesh. Can you hold them off?

title: Medieval Library
description: Bearded men hunch over scrolls and books, quills scratching quietly. Outside the weather turns slightly and no one notices. Shhh!

title: Monster Attack!
description: Panic! Offshore nuclear testing has resulted in  a wave of monster attacks throughout the city! Run for your lives!

title: Sleeping Dragon
description: Coiled and half buried on a towering mound of treasure, an ancient red dragon slumbers. You should probably let it be.

title: The Age of Steam
description: A long hiss from a massive locomotive blankets the platform in thick white mist while porters scurry about with baggage carts. "Tickets please!"

title: Forest: Night
description: Gentle breezes wafting through the trees overhead, the sounds of the night spill forth like jewels.

title: 1940's Office
description: "It ain't ritzy, and the pay is peanuts, but it's a decent place to get some shut-eye 'til knock-off time".

title: Asylum
description: You don't belong here... You don't know how you got here... There's been a mistake...Yeah, that's what everybody says.

title: Royal Salon
description: The Royal Salon, France, early 18th Century: a minefield of verbal sparring, whispered plots and social combat. Tread carefully

title: Dungeon I
description: You and your party creep along the twisting, torch-lit hallways of the abandoned mine. Pro tip: let the barbarian lead.

title: Mountain Pass
description: A treacherous path through towering mountain peaks is the only way through. Pray your supplies don't run out, and your party stays together.

title: Industrial Shipyard
description: Massive derricks heave containers from cargo ships overhead, while all manner of human activity occurs down below.

title: Middle Earth:Dawn
description: When not being overrun by filthy orcses, Middle Earth can be a beautiful place.

title: Orbital Platform
description: The massive viewports on this orbital platform allow for breathtaking views of this sectors' impressive stellar phenomena.

title: Dark and Stormy
keys: Betrayal at House on the Hill
description: "It was a dark and stormy night, the rain fell in torrents -- except at occasional intervals when it was checked by a violent gust of wind..." E. Bulwer-Lytton

title: Dinotopia
description: Across space and time, a verdant world has evolved without mankind. How can a planet be simultaneously peaceful and deadly?

title: Terror
description: There are doors you should not open. Places you should never see. Turn back... Now. Halloween 2014

title: Colosseum
description: Equal parts blood sport, theater and ritual murder. The Roman gladiators entertained the populace for over 600 years.

title: Medieval Town
description: Life inside the walls, where commerce, struggle and celebration mingle with honor, chaos and crime.

title: Ice Cavern
description: Soaring vaults of ice echo and groan, amplifying the freezing wind and hollow noises within.

title: Mountain Tavern
description: An oasis of warmth and hospitality in a harsh and unforgiving environment. Warm up in front of the fire, and share a mug of spiced wine.

title: Strangers on a Train
description: With its lush interiors, fine dining and finer passengers, the Orient Express was the most well-appointed overland transportation available.

title: Warehouse 13
description: An old cement factory on the outskirts of town. Power still works. Sort of. The perfect spot to disappear - or make things disappear.

title: Woodland Campsite
description: Every adventurer needs downtime. Here's a nice spot in the woods to rest the horses and enjoy a hot meal over a fire.

title: Super Hero
description: Like a Michael Bay movie in your head. Calling all heroes. The villainous tropes are on the loose!

title: Goblin's Cave
description: Journey up the winding path, follow the stream into the mouth of the cavern. Light your torches. Proceed...cautiously.

title: Overland with Oxen
description: Your party has assembled, your cart is loaded with supplies, your oxen are sturdy. Just keep your eyes peeled for trouble on the road.

title: There be Dragons
description: Wiping the last of the Kobold blood from your axe, you glare in the direction of the Cleric. "Enough of this nonsense, let's go get us a real fight!"

title: Cathedral
description: Cavernous, cold and quiet. Ethereal chants and muted footsteps. Paladins welcome.

title: Samurai HQ
description: Wealthy Japanese feudal lords used Samurai as their private armies.

title: Victorian London
description: London, 1851. Streets awash in noise - Merchants, organ grinders, Hansom cabs and the ever present din of humanity. Thank god for the rain.

title: Dome City Center
description: Amid the bustle of commerce, life under the dome runs smoothly. It almost makes one forget the hostile environment beyond.

title: Rise of the Ancients
description: ‚ÄúThe oldest and strongest emotion of mankind is fear, and the oldest and strongest kind of fear is fear of the unknown‚Äù  - H.P. Lovecraft

title: Starship Bridge
description: The hum of engines, the vibrations of deck plates - as familiar to you as a childhood lullaby.  Order, duty and experience keeps ships in the sky.

title: The Long Rain
description: "It was a hard rain, a perpetual rain, a sweating and steaming rain; it was a mizzle, a downpour, a fountain . . ." - Ray Bradbury

title: Temple of the Eye
description: Hooded figures gather around a gleaming eye, smoke wriggles like serpents to the ceiling. What dark energies have these voices awakened?

title: Into the Deep
description: If the darkness, pressure and isolation don't get you, the shadows in the trench just might. This kind of work isn't for everyone.

title: Clash of Kings
description: Two great armies lumber toward each other like centipedes of metal, flesh and bone. The ensuing conflict fuels song, poetry and legend for centuries.

title: Down by the Sea
description: Vast expanses of sand, hypnotic surf and the cries of gulls on the wing. Now there's that small issue of getting off this island paradise alive...

title: Catacombs
description: Dimly lit and twisting. The passages lead deeper and deeper under the city. The skulls of heroes past look on with blank anticipation.

title: Los Vangeles 3030
description: Towering spires of glass, neon and steel - dense air traffic and a constant rain that never cleanses. (Apologies to the Greek.)

title: Swamplandia
description: Hot, humid and swarming with insects of every kind. You'd go around if you could, but you know the only path is through.

title: Far Above the World
description: "Here am I, floating round my tin can". Or if you prefer -  "That's funny. The damage doesn't look as bad from out here."

title: City and the City
description: Where else can you get a roll of toilet paper, a falafel and a bootleg DVD at 3am?

title: Kaltoran Craft FE
description: Find out more at FraggedEmpire.com

title: Nephilim Labs FE
description: Find out more at FraggedEmpire.com

title: Frozen Wastes
description: Visibility and temperatures plummeting by the second, your only thought is survival. But in your heart you know - you've been through worse.

title: Uncommon Valor
description: Bullets buzz overhead like wasps defending a hive. One last look at the girl in the torn photo. Breathe deep, keep your head down. This is for freedom!

title: Xingu Nights
description: Dense, rich and verdant, the forest floor oozes with life and decay. Overhead, the canopy has hidden the sky for millennia.

title: Deep Space EVA
description: The deal was simple: 4 years working on a deep space mining operation and you could return to earth a free man. That is, if you survived.

title: Forbidden Galaxy!
description: Hurtle through the cosmos! Explore unknown worlds! Face fearsome foes from beyond! Set ray-guns to ADVENTURE!

title: The Slaughtered Ox
description: A horn of mead, a bowl of stew and a hook to hang your 50 feet of rope,  The Slaughtered Ox has been catering to the adventuring class for eons.

title: Derelict Freighter
description: The listing hulk of a derelict space craft makes a tempting salvage target. But what happened to her crew? Something is not quite right here.

title: True West
description: Sometimes having a price on your head isn't enough to keep you out of town. As long as there's whisky, cards, and the possibility of a payday.

title: Dark Continent
description: In another timeline, in another universe, it was the ancient city-states of Africa which eclipsed Rome as a beacon of civilization, culture . . . and war.

title: The Age of Sail
description: Fear not the mountainous waves and perilous winds! For who among us, will journey upon the sea and not gaze, ultimately, upon himself?

title: House on the Hill
keys: Betrayal at House on the Hill
description: You've heard the stories all your life. 50 years ago this night, an entire family killed after church one Sunday. Only one survived. 'The baby' still lives there.

title: Alien Night Club
description: It's hot, crowded, and swarming with species from every corner of the galaxy. The perfect spot to blend in, fade away or meet the perfect wingman.

title: Alien Machine Shop
description: You want the latest modifications? You want to squeeze a few more years out of those ancient matter displacers? It's gonna cost you.

title: Busy Space Port
description: The gleaming heart of any worthwhile planet. You can get transport here to just about any place.  It's a good spot to meet a pilot, a smuggler, or your next mark. Keep your head down.

title: Solemn Vow
description: When death is near, and retreat is not an option. Only the bravest have any purchase on the word "honor".

title: Abyssal Gaze
description: The blackness of space, the silence of the open sea, the depths of a cave. When you stare into the abyss...you know the rest.

title: The Desert Awaits
description: The air before you distorts in the heat. The sun has baked the world into an impenetrable crust. Nothing can survive out there for long. Yet out there is where you must go.

title: Dust to Dust
description: Sometimes the only sure thing is the end. Beyond the adventure, beyond the riches, beyond the fame. Everyone dies.

title: Before the Storm
description: Sharpen those swords, check the perimeter defences and pray to whatever gods you hold dear. Tomorrow's going to be a big day.

title: In the Shadows
description: This seemed like a pretty good place to hide, but now, you're not so sure. There's something familiar about this place. There's also something moving

title: Shelter from the Storm
description: Admittedly, it may not be the perfect spot. But it's a hell of a lot better than out there. At least it's warm and we'll get a chance to rest.

title: Disembodied Spirits
description: The night is alive with a thousand tiny voices. It's hard to make out what they're saying. Are they the welcoming committee? Or a warning klaxon.

title: Cave of Time
description: Deep underground an ancient cavern yawns before you and welcomes you, it's first visitors in a thousand years. The denizens of this place may not agree.

title: Protean Fields
description: A plane beyond your own, filled with darkening swirls of color and mist. A low, pulsing energy embraces your mind and dulls your thoughts.

title: The Inner Core
description: You're deep into it this time. The center of everything. The world around you thrums with energy and portent...

title: Bubbling Pools
description: The stench of life fills the air. Viscous fluid bubbles to the surface in great exhortations of gas and moisture. Something about these pools is familiar..

title: Desert Bazaar
description: Everything about this desert planet is familiar, but different at the same time. The pungent aroma of spice fills you with the thrill of adventure.

title: March of Faith
description: The devoted stream into the distance. The dust from their sandaled feet blocks out the sun for miles around. There's no stopping them. They believe.
